column5: They serve breakfast at the bait shop??this bait shop is on the Armstrong road!
There’s a restaurant / gas station @ 599 & 642 that had crawlers last September.

Ok,your talking the town of silver dollar,I was referring to silver minnow bait shop on the Armstrong road,ain't no breakfast at the silver minnow bait shop it just looks about the size of a garage,lol

https://www.walleyecentral.com/forum...d.php?t=481169 Just north of the turnoff to the town of Savant Lake. Exact location I don't remember. On the right side of the road (easy to miss) a hundred feet off the highway. They have a different name now, but I don't remember what. It's between the Savant lake town and the Wildewood parking lot. Someone here will know. Also, https://www.facebook.com/thefallsbait/ in Kakabeka Falls. Pooch
Vern's Minnow in Ignace - just across the street from the Subway. They've been in business for decades. phish
Good to know about the relocation…I would have driven right by it!! And sorry to hear about Larry. I remember him quite well.

Did not know the old "Larry's" had moved across the street. Thanks. Will be stopping there on June 16 for crawlers. Best. The "Minnow Shed" north of Silver $$ off 599 has leeches, minnows, and crawlers. Good prices, very nice people. They fly their plane to a variety of spots and collect bait. Not sure their crawlers live up to Larry's. I know a couple of camps in the area get their minnows from the Shed, as well as leeches. Silver $$ newer owners are super nice. We have skipped staying in Ignace because of the unknowns since covid and lack of places to eat. Silver $$ has good accommodations and fixes a nice breakfast to order. Liquor outlet is also a nice last minute spot. Then off to Austin's Wilderness Fishing Lodge on the 17th. Fished out of there too many years to count. Later, off to Press Lake Camp, July/August for two weeks. Another go to place...first class!
Whereis a good place to get night crawlers on the way to Ignace? Thanks Daman

My camp owners get their crawlers in Kakabeka Falls on the left side of the road next to the liquor store and a gas station. Cannot recall the name of the place, since they have changed ownership. I have used them for years and they are the very best. NO NOT get you crawlers in Ignace.
That’s Larry’s Bait Shop. It changed names recently (I guess Larry sold). Best bait shop around that area.
Does Ignace have a good bait shop?
If you are going north on 599 out of Ignace, Moose Creek Bait (north of the Silver Dollar) has crawlers and minnows. I've been very happy with his crawlers.
I'm gonna try silver minnow bait shop,north of Thunder Bay for the first time for crawlers.

Larry's Bait is now The Falls Bait & Tackle in Kakabeka Falls just west of T.B. They just moved there whole building across the street from where they were originally located! We always buy our leeches and a few crawlers from there. Larry sold the bait store a few years ago and passed away last May.
We had breakfast there last September as we had time to kill, nice people. There’s also a bait show past Savant Lake on 599.
